mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Ins (INS_NUM, INS_NAME, INS_PHONE, INS_FAXNUM, INS_ADDR, INS_ADDR_DETAIL, JOINID) VALUES (#{InsNum}, #{InsName}, #{InsPhone}, #{InsFaxNum}, #{InsAddr}, #{InsAddrDetail}, #{JoinId})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.*FROM ( SELECT INS_NUM, INS_NAME, INS_PHONE, INS_RGSTR FROM Ins ORDER BY INS_NUM ASC )tbl )
WHERE rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{cpp} AND rn <= #{pageNum} * #{cpp}
